title: "Trauma made you kind" no, fuck you

author: Flock_with_me
text:
Removed. It is totally OK to vent or even rant here, where we are safe and people will understand why we find some things upsetting. If we can't do this here, then where can we?

Also, it's really invalidating to negate the OP's explanation of how and why that statement does not reflect their reality. Turning it around and even labelling the OP a narc for expressing themselves here is inappropriate.

author: Flock_with_me
text: The OP used a Vent/Rant flair on the post. They weren't asking for advice.

author: blzrgurl71
text: Thank you, I didn't see the comment but I'm sure it wasn't worth seeing it.
